title: Has Eminem ever killed anyone? - Quora

response.answer_text: aaaaaaaaaaahhh i got a request from someone who loves eminem sksjsjjs Eminem strikes me as someone who wouldn’t kill anyone, but would put them in their place if they step out of line. Physically or non physically. Another answer to this said he beat up some snails or something.. i don’t remember. maybe they wouldn’t get out of his way. Snails are really slow. Like weekdays, me in algebra, getting a boyfriend… Maybe they weren’t hasty enough for the Rap God himself. thisdippityhippityhiphopyoudontreallywannagetintoapissinmatchwiththisrappitybratpackinamacinthebackoftheacbackpackrapcrapyapyapyacketyyack he says that pretty fast ~anyway~ To answer the actual question, no, he hasn’t killed anyone (that i know of.. i’m not doing research), but he has slayed and broken lots of people like a motherfuckin table with his skills, so… does that count? sry ethan lol :P

No ..this is the issue with entertainment ,people don't realize it's just entertainment. Sure he kills,tortures,rapes ext on record “very creativly”I might add ,but that does not make him a chain saw wielding maniac in real life. If he actually walked around in real life doing half of the stuff he does on record he would be dead,in jail,or in an an insane asylum not a multi millionaire living in a mansion the size of rhode island.

No. However, he has attempted to kill himself before, and he has beat the living snails out of some people (like the guy who his wife was cheating on him with). He doesn’t have much street credit, other than rapping to live, and beating people up; nothing BIG.
